scenario_text.value:
(Minoru’s lost in his historical photo-op.
Better not interfere.)
Huh... What? What’s in this picture?

Yooo, Takumaaa! You should take some pics
around here, too.

My phone’s picking up some weird stuff. Might
be broken. Let’s check yours.
You sure your finger isn’t in the shot?

It ain’t my finger! Something’s, like, all
fuzzy in my pics. Go on, take some!

(Doesn’t sound like he’s messing around.
Guess I’ll take a few test shots.)

Ah! See?! There really is something in these!
You take some pics too, Takuma!

(Might as well take a few shots like he
asked. Well, demanded.)
